content: --देश {%<ab>a.</ab>%} occupying the same place. (--शः {1} one spot or place. {2} a part or portion (of the whole), one side; °अवतीर्णा <ls>K. 22</ls>; तस्यैकदेशः <ls>U. 4</ls>; <ls>Mv. 2</ls>; विभावितैकदेशेन देयं यदभियुज्यते <ls>V. 4. 17</ls> ‘what is claimed should be given by one who is proved to have got a part of it’; (this is sometimes called एकदेशविभावितन्याय).
